author: Harry Johnson
description: I've tried this recipe with 2 to 3 dashes of Angostura and also orange bitters, but I prefer it with 2 dashes of both aromatic (Angostura) and orange bitters, so honouring Johnson, MacElhone, Mahoney and Grohusko. The result is a very aromatic semi-Dry Martini.
name: Tuxedo Cocktail Original

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
